english: When we grab a cup of wine, we bring it to the nose, we start to sense the aromas that we describe as red fruits, mint, leather, the mountains of Cordoba, the mountains of wherever, this is the romantic and beautiful vocabulary used in the world of wine.
spanish: Cuando agarramos una copa de vino, la acercamos a la nariz, comenzamos a percibir los aromas que describimos como frutas rojas, menta, cuero, las montañas de Córdoba, las montañas de donde sea, este es el vocabulario romántico y hermoso utilizado en el mundo del vino.

english: What happens if we get to gather with friends, open a bottle of wine, don't really feel like drinking it, leave it open and then return in a week to repeat the same occasion?
spanish: ¿Qué sucede si nos reunimos con amigos, abrimos una botella de vino, no tenemos muchas ganas de beberlo, lo dejamos abierto y luego regresamos en una semana para repetir la misma ocasión?

english: We bring the cup to the nose and the mountains of Cordoba and the red fruits are gone, instead a lemon taste has appeared, a bit of vinegar, something old, something oxidized, and automatically, the first thing that we do is to throw it away.
spanish: Acercamos la copa a la nariz y las montañas de Córdoba y las frutas rojas han desaparecido, en su lugar ha aparecido un sabor a limón, un poco de vinagre, algo viejo, algo oxidado, y automáticamente, lo primero que hacemos es desecharlo.

english: Because it wouldn't be suitable for human consumption.
spanish: Porque no sería adecuado para el consumo humano.

english: 2,500 years ago, a Greek man took that wine, and so that it wouldn't go bad, worked it through a botanical, an herb, which is wormwood.
spanish: Hace 2,500 años, un hombre griego tomó ese vino, y para que no se echara a perder, lo trabajó a través de una botánica, una hierba, que es la ajenjo.

english: This man, surely many of you know him, his name is Hippocrates.
spanish: Este hombre, seguramente muchos de ustedes lo conocen, se llama Hipócrates.

english: If you google him, you'll find a face similar to what you'll find for Socrates on the screen.
spanish: Si lo buscan en Google, encontrarán un rostro similar al que encontrarán para Sócrates en la pantalla.

english: Hippocrates is considered the father of Medicine.
spanish: Hipócrates es considerado el padre de la Medicina.

english: And what he did was to study Botany as a way to cure different illnesses of the human body.
spanish: Y lo que hizo fue estudiar la Botánica como una forma de curar diferentes enfermedades del cuerpo humano.

english: And he used wormwood as a natural preservative of wine and also as a digestive.
spanish: Y utilizó el ajenjo como conservante natural del vino y también como digestivo.

english: Imagine a time when there was no pharmacy, where you went to buy a blister, and took a pill after a giant feast.
spanish: Imagina un tiempo en el que no existía la farmacia, donde ibas a comprar una ampolla y tomabas una pastilla después de un gran festín.

english: It was simply more fun to take that same pill with a drink, a little cocktail, at the end of the day.
spanish: Simplemente era más divertido tomar esa misma pastilla con una bebida, un pequeño cóctel, al final del día.

english: Hippocrates creates this product, but he doesn't know that he ends up creating it.
spanish: Hipócrates crea este producto, pero no sabe que termina creándolo.

english: It's Galen that gives the name Hippocratic wine to this product.
spanish: Es Galeno quien le da el nombre de vino hipocrático a este producto.

english: He names it Hippocratic wine about 400 or 500 years afterward, because if you remember quickly, in history, the Romans conquered the Greeks, and they took part of their culture and their studies.
spanish: Lo nombra vino hipocrático unos 400 o 500 años después, porque si recuerdas rápidamente, en la historia, los romanos conquistaron a los griegos y tomaron parte de su cultura y sus estudios.

english: Galen studies Hippocrates, and gives it the name of Hippocratic wine.
spanish: Galen estudia a Hipócrates y le da el nombre de vino hipocrático.

english: And there's a fundamental event within the period of the Romans, which is that they adopt Christianity as the official religion.
spanish: Y hay un evento fundamental dentro del periodo de los romanos, que es que adoptan el cristianismo como religión oficial.

english: So, there was something very important within Christianity, which was the Mass, the sacred Eucharist, for them.
spanish: Así que hubo algo muy importante dentro del cristianismo, que era la Misa, la sagrada Eucaristía para ellos.

english: And it's the part where they share the body and blood of Christ in the form of bread and wine.
spanish: Y es la parte donde comparten el cuerpo y la sangre de Cristo en forma de pan y vino.

english: The wine is made from grapes.
spanish: El vino se hace con uvas.
